etymologies: Middle English: probably from an Anglo-Norman derivative of the noun tip

definitions: a woman's long fur scarf or shawl worn around the neck and shoulders.
shortDefinitions: woman's long fur scarf or shawl worn around neck and shoulders

definitions: a long ceremonial scarf worn especially by the clergy.
shortDefinitions: long scarf or shawl worn as ceremonial garment

definitions: a long, narrow strip of cloth forming part of or attached to a hood or sleeve.
shortDefinitions: long, narrow strip of cloth forming part of or attached to hood or sleeve
